tool_description: Can translate any number to Swahili words.
name: Namba Translator
title: Namba Translator

api_list.name: sw_num
api_list.description: Can translate a number to Swahili words.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://namba-translator.p.rapidapi.com/sw-num/43"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "namba-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://namba-translator.p.rapidapi.com/sw-num/{num}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "namba-translator.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
